exceptions.tactic: intros n' n x st s Hneq Hvalid.
intros n'' n x st s Hneq Hvalid.
intros n'' n''' x st s Hneq Hvalid.
intros n'' n''' x' st s Hneq Hvalid.
intros n'' n''' x' st' s Hneq Hvalid.
intros n'' n''' x' st' s' Hneq Hvalid.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n' n x st s Hneq Hvalid. unfold getLocal. unfold upd. destruct (n' == n) eqn:Heq. - rewrite (eqP Heq). reflexivity. - reflexivity.
